name: Subhajitchaudhury.GitHub.io
body:
# Subhajit Chaudhury


[CV](/data/SubhajitCV.pdf) / [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.co.jp/citations?user=EBTpFrQAAAAJ&hl=en) / [Linkedin](https://jp.linkedin.com/in/subhajit-chaudhury-24955455)

I am working as a Researcher at [NEC Central Research Labs](http://www.nec.com/en/global/rd/), Japan from October 2014. My research interests are on Computer Vision and Deep Learning. Currently, I am working on applying deep learning techniques for predicting structural integrity of bridges and roads from raw images and videos. Personally, I am also working on learning end-to-end Fully Convolutional Networks for solving low level vision tasks like image restoration. To know more please visit my [webpage](https://sites.google.com/site/subhaweb1411/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
